comments: TERRIBLE PROFESSOR! Had her for introduction to Latina/o studies and it was a mistake. Expect to read a lot and to never expect knowing what you will do in future classes. her syllabus is useless since she never updates it from past years. 10 page research paper, presentation, test, and essay portion is all part of your final. STAY AWAY

stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Dr. Torres\'s class is a one of a kind experience. She teaches through group discussion, and it actually works quite well. You will have to put in the work to get the grade, but she is very fair and understanding. Her class will spark insights that you have never had before. Lots of reading, but honestly an awesome class. No textbooks!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ  RESPECTED
comments: Dr. Torres is a very knowledgabe professor not only in the field of which she teaches but also in life. She always takes her time in and out of the class room to help out students on course work or be there for personal counseling, which you do not see in many professors now a days. A very humble and comical professor and one of my favorites!

comments: Great class, terrible teacher, only take it if it is required for your degree. I could rant for hours about how the teaching style is not conductive to learning. She makes little to no sense with the syllabus, her quizzes, nothing. She gives test first, then you are supposed to discuss. She never says how she interprets the readings. Stay away.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: CARING  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Dr. Torres really cares about her students and genuinely wants them to succeed. She is very knowledgeable and passionate about what she teaches and will take the time talk to you if you ask. Taking this class allowed me to obtain an internship and build connections that helped me after graduation and gain experience that landed me my first job!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Like many other students this is by far the worst class I have taken at UMKC. Dr. Torres is unresponsive when trying to express your concern on grades, or assignments. Her syllabus and assignments are very unclear, unorganized, confusing. The content and intent of the class is very interesting, just need a better professor!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: *IF YOU VALUE YOUR SANITY, STEER FAR CLEAR!* At no point, through the entire semester was the mandatory attendance beneficial. Class time provides ZERO understanding, just rants about whatever crosses her mind. Syllabus was altered, constantly, even in the last week of the course, when we had all thought that it was finally over, she piled more on!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr. Torres has a passion for her students, however, she is very unclear at times on what she expects from her class. The syllabus given at the beginning of the semester was altered several times. When talking on the phone, she seems occupied and will rush you off after setting the appointment to call her.

comments: One of the worst professors I have ever had. She usually seems lost and she is extremely confusing. I would NOT recommend her to anyone!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Torres is the kind of nice that is annoying. She genuinely cares about her students but thats really the only good part. Her lesson plans are not very clear and we only went over about two powerpoints, the entire class! I would only suggest her as a elective option if you can deal with her ramblings and unplanned lesson style.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She is very involved in the subjects she teaches. She knows what she is talking about and she works to show a different side of topics that students have not been taught before. She doesn\'t argue, she just challenges students to think more deeply. I would definitely suggest her as a professor.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Okay Dr. Torres is someone who knows her stuff, but teaching is not her calling. Part of me wants to say its because she has all this knowledge to share, but can\'t formulate lesson plans to get her point across to where students can understand. She would be more useful as a mentor to students than a teacher, that\'s my opinion.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (4)  Get ready to read (4)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (2)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She\'s rude, disorganized, constantly loses her train of though and interrupts students frequently. She also treats her students like they\'re 12, including assigned seats. She gets aggitated if you challenege her inconsistencies. For the sake of your grade, don\'t share your opinion. Just keep your mouth shut and pretend that you agree with her.

comments: WOW!The worst professor I\'ve ever had in my life!Is not organized,lectures are usually not relevant to text read, rude to students that walk in late, not useful or helpful in conferences, her perspective is coming from a Chicana Catholic woman and talks A LOT about this topic over all other topics. Grading is hard and lots of reading.At ur own risk

comments: straight up MEAN. do not take this class. the whole point of the class is to learn about other people but the teacher will argue with you if she disagrees. she does not explain anything but expects us to know how to do the work, and her voice gets annoying.
